text: Esther Jansma (24 December 1958 â€“ 23 January 2025) was a Dutch writer, poet and academic. Jansma was born in Amsterdam.Prof.dr. E. Jansma (1958 - ) at Catalogus Professorum Academiae Rheno-Traiectae. She worked as an archaeologist. Jansma published her first collection of poetry Stem onder mijn bed (Voice under my Bed) in 1988. She was a professor in the Geosciences department at Utrecht University. Jansma died from cancer in Utrecht, Netherlands on 23 January 2025, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Dutch poets Category:Dutch academics Category:Dutch archaeologists Category:Writers from Amsterdam
title: Esther Jansma
